body: Damn, bad reason for having Nami raped.  She could take out those weaklings all by herself. And we saw that after they left the house.  So that's a bad reasoning. And with saying if Usopp didn't come makes it sound like they women always need a man by their side. Wtf is it with that? Anyways, she doesn't look like Nami at all. So the drawing isn't that good either. 1/5 from me. -,-
Why the fuck are you guys ripping tags from e-hentai? It doesn't work when you take fresh galleries, they end up completely under tagged.
